str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From phobos; to frighten, i.e. to be alarmed; by analogy, to be in awe of, i.e. Revere.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To veil, hide, conceal, envelop. Akin to klepto and krupto; to cover up.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To uncover, bring to light, reveal. From apo and kalupto; to take off the cover, i.e. Disclose.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
